description: My name is Gray, just like the color! I am a creative professional who is passionate about elevating customer experience across platforms. Whether in luxury retail environments or in higher education, my refined interpersonal skills allow me to quickly connect with clients, fostering trust and understanding. Through visual merchandising and social media marketing, I deliver sophisticated results that fuel sales. With art direction, I construct multifaceted campaigns that elicit visceral responses that both captivate and stimulate the consumer. In all business ventures, I task myself with the challenge of eternally defying my wildest notion of brilliance as I offer seasoned clients and emerging markets the best possible customer experience.
